Elsa.description: Sara is Elsa's colleague at Orange. They share a professional relationship and occasionally collaborate on projects. Sara admires Elsa's dedication and expertise.

John.description: Sara is John's acquaintance. They occasionally interact in social settings and share mutual acquaintances. John respects Sara's dedication to her work.

James.description: Sara is James's acquaintance. They occasionally interact in social settings and share mutual acquaintances. James admires Sara's dedication to her work and creativity.

Tom.description: Sara is Tom's colleague at Orange. They share a professional relationship and occasionally collaborate on projects. Tom admires Sara's creativity and dedication.

Alice.description: Sara is Alice's sister. They share a close sisterly bond and often confide in each other. Alice values Sara's support and companionship.
